edu.stanford.nlp.neural

Class VectorMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,float[]>
        • edu.stanford.nlp.neural.VectorMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,float[]>

    public class VectorMap
extends java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,float[]>
    A serializer for reading / writing word vectors. This is used to read word2vec in hcoref, and is primarily here for its efficient serialization / deserialization protocol, which saves/loads the vectors as 16 bit floats.
    Author:
    Gabor Angeli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

                             throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        in - The stream to read from. This is not closed.
        Returns:
        The word vectors encoded on the stream.
